alert.note: Alert for Inland Broward County; Metro Broward County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 6:11PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Broward County through 645 PM EDT... At 611 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sawgrass Mills Mall, or near Sunrise. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fort Lauderdale, Pembroke Pines, Hollywood, Miramar, Coral Springs, Davie, Plantation, Sunrise, Tamarac, Margate, Lauderhill, Weston, North Lauderdale, Lauderdale Lakes, Dania Beach, Cooper City, West Park, Royal Palm Ranches, Sunshine Acres and Chambers Estates. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Inland Broward County; Metro Broward County
